message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose all the details at this stage, I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1250000. This price reflects the potential value I see in this product and its market potential. Let me know your thoughts. If this isn't the right fit for you, I have another buyer lined up.
